definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: You should sing according to my drumbeats, otherwise, there would be no order.
sentences.chinese: 打的鼓点开口，否则就没有板眼了。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗一定有个行得通的方案，否则他不会这么干。

sentences.english: Don't push me, or I will break your neck.
sentences.chinese: 别欺人太甚，否则我拧断你的脖子。

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老师说，论文明天应交，否则后果由个人负责。

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必须以小写字母开头，否则需要加上单引号。

sentences.english: It’s illegal to change the clothes on a storefront mannequin unless you draw the shades first.
sentences.chinese: 给前店的人体模特儿换衣服时必须有遮挡，否则违法。

sentences.english: But you don‘t fry them too long or they break."So
sentences.chinese: 但不要炸得时间过长否则会破裂。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the security of the strong-named assembly would be compromised.
sentences.chinese: 否则，此强式名称组件的安全性将受到威胁。

sentences.english: Some clothes are not the advisability of using either washing machines wash, or it will lose.
sentences.chinese: 有些衣物则不宜用洗衣机洗涤，否则将得不偿失。

sentences.english: Dissenters must be consistent, though, otherwise they'll fail to convince the majority.
sentences.chinese: 反对者必须坚持一致，否则就不能成功说服大多数人。

sentences.english: 'Not on the highest setting or you might burn up the leather, ' he notes.
sentences.chinese: 他说，不要把风力开到最高档，否则可能会烫伤皮面。

sentences.english: Others say only if they cheat, or abuse you.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人说除非欺骗或者虐待，否则不离开。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the syntax is not recognized.
sentences.chinese: 否则，语法就不能被识别。

sentences.english: Turn in your gun, or I will kill you.
sentences.chinese: 把枪交出来，否则我会杀了你。

sentences.english: Don't exhaust yourself or minor health problems will set in.
sentences.chinese: 不要让自己太疲惫，否则健康问题会乘虚而入的。

sentences.english: How else to explain those wacky, way-out-in-left-field roadside attractions you'll stumble upon?
sentences.chinese: 否则怎么解释你偶然遇到的出现在路左边的景点？

definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
in order to avoid/so as not to
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
